name: Candy Cane - 8oz Soy Wax Candle Scented with Essential Oils
description:
Who can't resist the yummy peppermint of a Candy Cane? Only this lovely scent will awaken your senses and make you smile ~ without the overpowering sweetness. 

Our Candy Cane soy wax candle is made from a blend of Peppermint, Spearmint, Eucalyptus and Rosemary essential oils and made with 100% natural soy wax - no artificial dyes or fragrances! 

Also available in a 12 oz. glass status jar with glass lid for $16.00!

Approximate burn time is 60 hours. To optimize the life and scent of your all natural candle, we recommend you do not burn near a draft, keep your wick trimmed, and keep the lid on when not in use.

After your organic soy candle has burned completely down, simply wash with soap and water and your jar is reusable or recyclable.

**WARMING - TO PREVENT FIRE**
~burn candle within sight
~keep out of reach of children and pets
~never set on or near anything that may catch on fire

name: Christmas Memories - SCENT OF THE MONTH - 8oz Soy Candle Scented with Essential Oils
description:
~*~*~ DECEMBER'S SCENT OF THE MONTH ~*~*~

(Normally $12.95)

All the scents of the holidays wrapped in one candle. Spicy orange, cinnamon, frank, myrhh, and vanilla are just a few oils used to bring your senses to life ~ Perfect for your holiday parties or to give as a gift.

Also available in a 12 oz. glass status jar with glass lid for on SALE for $15.50!

Our Christmas Memories Soy Candle is made from a 100% essential oil blend and 100% all natural Soy wax making it better for your body and the environment!

Approximate burn time is 60 hours. To optimize the life and scent of your all natural candle, we recommend you do not burn near a draft and keep the lid on when not in use.

After your organic soy candle has completely burned down, simply wash with soap and water and your jar is reusable or recyclable.

**WARNING - TO PREVENT FIRE**
~burn candle within sight.
~keep out of reach of children and pets.
~never set on or near anything that may catch on fire.

name: Fresh Air - 12 oz. aromatherapy soy wax candle
description:
If you love clean, cool, fresh scents ~ then you'll love this candle ~ this scent appeals to both men & women!

Our Fresh Air soy wax candle is made from a blend of Litsea, Bergamot, Lemon, Grapefruit, Lime, Ginger, Rosewood, Lemongrass, Citronella, Patchouli, Ylang Ylang, Cinnamon and Neroli essential oils and made with 100% natural soy wax - no artificial dyes or fragrances! 

Truly is a breathe of fresh air!

Approximate burn time is 60 hours. To optimize the life and scent of your all natural candle, we recommend you do not burn near a draft, keep your wick trimmed, and keep the lid on when not in use.

After your organic soy candle has burned completely down, simply wash with soap and water and your jar is reusable or recyclable.

**WARMING - TO PREVENT FIRE**
~burn candle within sight
~keep out of reach of children and pets
~never set on or near anything that may catch on fire

name: Cape Fear Courtyard - 8oz. aromatherapy soy wax candle
description:
The light floral scents from this candle will take you back to your favorite garden in our Cape Fear area or any southern garden for that matter. Relaxing, refreshing and even a bit sensual ~ just like a southern lady!

This scent is made from an essential oil blend of Jasmine, Lavender, Chamomile, Vanilla and a tiny drop of Ginger. No artificial ingredients used.

Also available in a 12 oz. glass status jar with glass lid for $16.00!

Approximate burn time is 60 hours. To optimize the life and scent of your all natural candle, we recommend you do not burn near a draft.

Once this candles life is complete, simply scrape the wax out and wash with soap and warm water. Your jar is then reusable or recyclable.

**WARNING - TO PREVENT FIRE**
~burn candle within sight
~keep out of reach of children and pets
~never set on or near anything that may catch on fire

name: Lavender - 8oz aromatherapy essential oil soy candle
description:
Our Lavender Soy Candle is made from 100% essential oils and 100% all natural Soy wax.

This popular scent is just NICE ~ warm and relaxing!

Also available in a 12 oz. glass status jar with glass lid for $16.00!

Candle is in an 8oz jar with pewter lid. Approximate burn time is 60 hours. To optimize the life and scent of your all natural candle, we recommend you do not burn near a draft and keep the lid on when not in use.

After your organic soy candle has completely burned down, simply wash with soap and water and your jar is reusable or recyclable.

**WARNING - TO PREVENT FIRE**
~burn candle within sight.
~keep out of reach of children and pets.
~never set on or near anything that may catch on fire.
